summary: This document is a certification of good standing for the corporation known as Jeepers, Inc., filed with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor in the Virgin Islands. It confirms that the corporation was incorporated on August 18, 2003, and is authorized to conduct business in the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes is identified as the Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks, who certifies the good standing of Jeepers, Inc.

events.title: Incorporation of Jeepers, Inc.
events.description: Jeepers, Inc. filed Articles of Incorporation.

events.title: Certificate of Incorporation Issued
events.description: A Certificate of Incorporation was issued authorizing Jeepers, Inc. to conduct business.

locations: 5049 Kongens Code, Charlotte Amalie, Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: Jeepers, Inc. was incorporated on August 18, 2003.
A Certificate of Incorporation was issued on August 20, 2003.
The corporation is considered to be in good standing as of August 26, 2013.
